review: I had suffered fracture of left leg due to bike accident. Dr. Arun Reddy did my leg operation and nail was inserted. Within short span I was able to walk normally. Now my leg has completely healed.  Now I have goten the nail also removed. Thanks to him, I am living a normal life again.

Dr. Arun did an elbow surgery for me. He was understanding about the injury and explained it very well before surgery which made me feel positive about the surgery. He also followed up regularly post surgery.
